results.title: Building
results.creator_credit: Dale Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dale Smith dedicates her story to her dad, a man of infinite creativity and resourcefulness. His inventiveness extended to building houses, caravans, mobile homes, trailers and, above all, a family who adore him.

results.title: Dust dance
results.creator_credit: Judy Griffiths, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In 2000. Judy Griffiths took over her family farm. Having studied agriculture science, Griffiths was able to apply what she learnt to help her care for the land through some of the toughest times her farm has ever seen.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Judy Griffiths, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Learning Lucie style
results.creator_credit: Elizabeth Creese, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My life with my family
results.creator_credit: Negabanchi Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Life, so far, has been quite a struggle for Negabanchi Tebeje and her family. With her dad fighting for democracy, the Tebeje family have moved from Ethiopia to Sudan and, finally, Australia.

results.title: [The Working women's centre]
results.creator_credit: Laura Butterworth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: As the Working Women’s Centre in South Australia faces budget cuts, Laura Butterworth reflects on the history of the centre, the stories of the women workers and the battles fought and won.

results.title: Welcome to my nightmare
results.creator_credit: Zoero Theoharou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zoero Theoharou delves back into a time when she felt lost, trapped in a cold nightmare of misery from which she couldn’t wake. The only release from this nightmare was through pain.
